definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right

sentences.english: They argued against the use of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他们据理反对使用这种药。

sentences.english: However, Di Gong morally justified to argue without compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但是狄公大义凛然，据理争辩毫不妥协。

sentences.english: Peter argued against making a new job cut in the company.
sentences.chinese: 彼特据理反对公司新一轮的裁员。

sentences.english: He argued against the use of anaesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 他据理反对麻醉的作用。

sentences.english: They argued against such a policy.
sentences.chinese: 他们据理反对这种政策。

sentences.english: You can stand up for your right.
sentences.chinese: 你可以为你的权利据理力争。
